definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The woman with a large hat on her head is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 冠词，顾名思义，就是戴在名词头上的一顶帽子。

sentences.english: By definition, a conversation is bi-directional communication.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，“对话”就是一个双向的沟通过程。

sentences.english: Hide and unhide pictures, audio, videos and all other files.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，用了隐藏手机上的任何文件。

sentences.english: In this sense of the word, a catalyst is a person that causes something else to happen.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，促进者是能使事情发生的人。

sentences.english: As the name implied, this is an bundle of rebloomed flowers.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，这是一束再放的花朵。

sentences.english: Telomerase is the enzyme that builds telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 而端粒酶顾名思义，就是生成端粒的那种酶。

sentences.english: As the name suggests, this is an international news channel located at Doha in Qatar.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，这是一个位于卡塔尔多哈的国际新闻频道。

sentences.english: Like its name suggests, social media is, by nature, well – social.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，社交媒体的本质就在于其社交性。

sentences.english: As the name implies the courts of appeals have appel late jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，上诉法院有受理上诉的裁判权。

sentences.english: In Loke Yun, they only sell Hainan Chicken rice.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义海南鸡饭，除了鸡肉，饭也是另一个灵魂。

sentences.english: As the name implies, it is a bud which blossoms again.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，这是一束再放的花朵。

sentences.english: Obviously, it organizes leasing packages for lessors and lessees.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，它的工作就是为出租人和承租人牵线搭桥。

sentences.english: Water corridor, as the term suggests, is the corridor built above the water.
sentences.chinese: 水廊，顾名思义，就是依水而建的走廊。

sentences.english: As the name implies, Easy Video Joiner is very easy to be used.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，易视频乔伊纳是非常容易的使用。

sentences.english: As their name suggests, these infect bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 噬菌体，顾名思义它们能感染细菌。

sentences.english: Headlines, by definition, are short and catchy.
sentences.chinese: 新闻标题，顾名思义，应该简短而引人注目。

definition: to be called/to be known as
in a nutshell/to put it briefly
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
also known as/alternative name/to also be called
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
